title: TSMC to see 2Q24 revenue increase
text: Credit: DIGITIMES TSMC is expected to post revenue growth in the second quarter of 2024, both sequentially and on an annual basis, when the pure-play foundry's 3/5nm process capacity will be almost fully utilized, according to industry sources.
